entries: You compel shadows to create one of the following effects at a point you can see within range:
The shadow of a creature or object changes size or shape, up to a maximum of double or half its normal size. This effect lasts for up to 1 minute, or until it moves.
You cause shadows to conceal up to 2 creatures within a 15-foot radius area of dim light or darkness, allowing them to hide as a bonus action on their next turn if they remain in the area.
A creature or object's shape becomes either harder or softer, making its form either easier or harder to discern from the shape of the shadow. This effect lasts for up to 1 hour.

You reach into the shadow of a creature within range and draw upon it to create a Tiny object made of pure darkness. The object cannot weigh more than 5 lb, regardless of its shape. Alternatively, you can target an already existing shadow object and reshape it. You cannot make fine detailed items like a working key, but you can make for example a dagger.
If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have no more than two of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

At 5th level, you can have up to five non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss all such effects as an action. Additionally you can use an action to hide your shadow, this requires you to concentrate on the effect.

At 11th level, you can make a shadow act independently of its owner or object. It cannot interact with anything and is still connected to what gives the shadow. At 17th level, the duration of this spell's 1-minute effects is increased to 1 hour.

Additionally, you can create a shadow from nothing, making it appear in a 5-foot cube as a form of your choosing. It cannot interact with anything and you can move it 20 feet by casting the spell and it lasts for 1 hour.

spell.name: Vexatious Blow
entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and their mind is shrouded in dark intent until the start of your next turn. If the target doesn't target you with an attack or spell before then, they take {@damage 1d8} psychic damage.

This spell's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} psychic damage to the target, and the damage the target takes for not targeting you increases to {@dice 2d8}. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8 / 3d8}) and 17th level

spell.name: Vicious Mockery
entries: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range. If the target can hear you (though it need not understand you), it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take {@damage 1d4} psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Vigor
entries: You touch a willing creature with at least one unspent Hit Die remaining. The creature may spend a single Hit Die (if they have more than one type, they may choose which to spend) and gain temporary hit points equal to the amount rolled plus the creature's Constitution modifier.
You can allow a creature to roll an additional Hit Die at 5th (2), 11th (3), and 17th level (4).

spell.name: Volatile Growth
entries: You hurl a magical seed at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} piercing damage, and the seed lodges itself into the creature for the duration or until it explodes.

If the creature is hit by a spell of 1st level or higher before the end of your next turn, the seed absorbs some of the spell's magic and explodes into a rain of thorns. All creatures within 5 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw, or take {@damage 1d6} piercing damage.
This spell's initial damage and area damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Whelm
entries: You thrust your arm forward with your palm open and fingers splayed, targeting a creature you can see within range, and attempt to overwhelm its mind. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw, taking {@dice 1d8} points of psychic damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Constructs, undead, and creatures with an Intelligence score of 4 or lower are immune to the spell.

If the spell reduces a creature to 0 hit points, they are {@condition unconscious}, but stable. They remain {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, or until someone uses an action to shake or slap them awake, at which time they gain 1 hit point.
If the creature takes damage while they are {@condition unconscious}, they lose their stability and must begin to make death saving throws as normal.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Witching Words
entries: You utter foul words, pointing at a creature you can see, bestowing rather specific and peculiar curse onto your target.

Choose one skill. The next time the cursed creature attempts a check of the skill you chose while casting this spell, it must succeed on Wisdom saving throw, or suffer disadvantage on the roll. The spell then ends. The spell ends immediately if it is targeted by this spell again.
At 5th level, the spell's duration increase to 10 minutes. At

11th level, the range of the spell is increased to 60 feet and you can ignore the somatic component of this spell. At 17th level, you can now target two creatures if they are within 10 feet of each other.

spell.name: Word of Radiance
entries: You utter a divine word, and {@condition burning|HA:GS} radiance erupts from you. Each creature of your choice that you can see within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} radiant damage.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Ablative Ward
entries: You touch a piece of worn armor or clothing and imbue it with magic. The creature wearing this the imbued item gains 4 temporary hit points for the duration. When these temporary hit points are exhausted, at the start of the creatures next turn it instead gains one less temporary hit point (3 temporary hit points). This repeats each time the temporary hit points are exhausted, until no temporary hit points would be gained.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the initial temporary hit points increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Absorb Elements

time.condition: which you take when you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage

entries: The spell captures some of the incoming energy, lessening its effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack. You have resistance to the triggering damage type until the start of your next turn. Also, the first time you hit with a melee attack on your next turn, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the triggering type, and the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Acrid Delight
entries: You touch a piece of food (weighing up to 5 lbs), rotting it from the inside, but maintaining its original, taste, texture, appearance and smell. If the piece of food is then eaten by a creature within one hour, the creature must make a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} until it completes a long rest. On a successful save the damage is halved and it is not {@condition poisoned}. If the food is not eaten within one hour, it succumbs to its rotten nature and spoils.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each spell slot above 1st.

spell.name: Adapt to Elements

m.text: two days worth of rations, worth at least 1 gp in total, which the spell consumes

entries: You touch a creature, warding it from extreme environments.
For the duration, the creature ignores the effects of extreme heat, extreme cold, frigid water, and high altitude.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. Each creature must touch at least another targeted creature.

spell.name: Alarm

components.m: a tiny bell and a piece of fine silver wire

entries: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or an area within range that is no larger than a 20- foot cube. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever a Tiny or larger creature touches or enters the warded area.
When you cast the spell, you can designate creatures that won't set off the alarm. You also choose whether the alarm is mental or audible.
A mental alarm alerts you with a ping in your mind if you are within 1 mile of the warded area. This ping awakens you if you are sleeping.
An audible alarm produces the sound of a hand bell for 10 seconds within 60 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the cube increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Animal Friendship
entries: This spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm.

Choose a beast that you can see within range. It must see and hear you. If the beast's Intelligence is 4 or higher, the spell fails. Otherwise, the beast must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by you for the spell's duration. If you or one of your companions harms the target, the spells ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional beast for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Arcane Quiver
entries: You pull your hand to the side as five arrows, bolts, or bullets made of eldritch energy appear, hovering beside you. The ammunition created matches the weapon used in the casting of this spell, and the spell ends early if you let go of it. Only you can grab ahold of this ammunition.
Whenever you use a piece of ammunition, another appear, and fired ammunition disappear at the end of your turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls. The +1 bonus does not stack with similar effects. When you use a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the bonus increases to +2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to +3.

spell.name: Arcane Weapon
entries: You touch a weapon and imbue it with magic. For the duration the weapon counts as a magical weapon, any damage dealt by it is force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the weapon gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls and gains {@dice 1d4} extra force damage. The +1 bonus does not stack with similar effects. When you use a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the bonus increases to +2 and the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d4}.

spell.name: Arcing Strike
entries: You infuse your weapon with lightning, scorching and charging it with electricity. When you cast this spell, you also take the {@action Attack} action. The first time you hit with this weapon before the start of your next turn, the target takes an additional {@damage 1d8} lightning damage as the static within the weapon discharges. Another creature of your choice that you can see within 10 feet must make a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Armor of Agathys
entries: A protective magical force surrounds you, manifesting as a spectral frost that covers you and your gear. You gain 5 temporary hit points for the duration. If a creature hits you with a melee attack while you have these hit points, the creature takes 5 cold damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, both the temporary hit points and the cold damage increase by 5 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Arms of Hadar
entries: You invoke the power of Hadar, the Dark Hunger. Tendrils of dark energy erupt from you and batter all creatures within 10 feet of you. Each creature in that area must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage and can't take reactions until its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage, but suffers no other effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Assassin's Burial

components.m: a corpse of a humanoid creature

entries: You touch a single humanoid corpse that died within the last hour, and imbue it with a foul enchantment. If a creature discovers the corpse that was unaware of it when the spell was cast, they must make a Wisdom saving throw. If they fail, they are {@condition frightened} of the corpse for one minute and will attempt to move so that they can no longer see it. If the subject attempts to reveal the presence the corpse to any other creature, they immediately forget that they have detected the corpse for one hour. Each time this happens, the target can make a Wisdom saving throw. If they succeed, the spell ends after this instance of temporary memory loss.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration of the spell increases by 24 hours for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bane
entries: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Beast Bond

components.m: a bit of fur wrapped in a cloth

entries: You establish a telepathic link with one beast you touch that is friendly to you or {@condition charmed} by you. The spell fails if the beasts Intelligence score is 4 or higher. Until the spell ends, the link is active while you and the beast are within line of sight of each other. Through the link, the beast can understand your telepathic messages to it, and it can telepathically communicate simple emotions and concepts back to you. While the link is active, the beast gains advantage on attack rolls against any creature within 5 feet of you that you can see.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration of the spell increases by 10 minutes for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Black Lotus Assault
entries: You summon a swirl of black lotus petals to surround your weapon, distracting your foes and enabling you to strike with great power. When you cast this spell, you also take the {@action Attack} action. Each successful hit you make with this weapon before the spell ends, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw or have a new effect apply. Once you've made three weapon attacks, the spell ends.

entries.name: 1st Attack
entries: If the target fails their saving throw, their movement speed is halved until the end of their next turn.

entries.name: 2nd Attack
entries: If the target fails their saving throw, they take {@damage 1d6} psychic damage and cannot take reactions until after the end of your next turn.

entries.name: 3rd Attack
entries: If the target fails their saving throw, they take {@damage 2d6} psychic damage and cannot take bonus actions during their next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blackblood
entries: You transform a portion of your blood into a poisonous substance. As you cast this spell, you must spend a number of hit points. You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to the amount spent. For as long as these temporary hit points last, whenever a creature hits you with an attack while within 5 feet of you they take {@damage 2d8} poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} until the start of their next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you gain 5 additional temporary hit points for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blackflame
entries: You choose a flame that you can see within range and that fits within a 5-foot cube. The flame momentarily changes color into a deep black, and then lashes out at surrounding creatures. Each creature within a 10-foot radius of the flame must make a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage on a failed save, or half damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bless
entries: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range.
Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bloodburn
entries: You inflict a {@condition burning|HA:GS} pain upon yourself, causing another creature that you can see within range to feel an even more excruciating pain as their blood boils. As you cast the spell, you must spend a number of hit points. The creature must then make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 2d6} + the number of hit points spent as fire damage, and immediately falls {@condition prone} as they become wracked with pain. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't fall {@condition prone}. Constructs, elementals, and undead are immune to this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bond Item
entries: You touch a creature and an item weighing no more than 100 pounds and form a link between them. Until the spell ends, the target can recall it to its hand as a bonus action as long as it is on the same plane of existence.

If another creature is holding or wearing the item when you try to recall it, they make a Charisma saving throw, and if they succeed, the spell fails. They make this save with advantage if they have had possession of the item for more than 1 minute.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional item for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bridge of Branches
entries: You cause large branches to sprout from a surface, creating a makeshift bridge up to 10 feet wide and 20 feet long. The bridge can hold up to 600 pounds at once. The bridge has AC 10 and 50 hit points. If the bridge is reduced to zero hit points, the spell is cast again, the entire bridge collapses and immediately withers away.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the bridge's possible width increases by 5 feet and length increases by 10 feet, its weight limit increases by 300 pounds, and its hit points increase by 25 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Buoyancy

time.condition: which you take when you or a creature within 60 feet of you is submerged in a liquid

components.m: a glass bubble filled with air

entries: As a reaction when someone is below water, choose up to five willing creatures that you can see within range that are completely submerged in water or another liquid. A submerged creature rises towards the surface at a rate of 60 feet per round, at the start of its turn. If it is unwilling, it must make a Constitution saving throw. When it reaches the surface, it is sustained there, and can move under its own swimming speed, or moved by others (such as with a rope).
The spell ends for a creature if that creature completely leaves the liquid.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target five additional creatures for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Burning Hands
entries: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bursting Boils
entries: You make large sickening boils sprout from your flesh as means to deflect damage and hinder your foes. You gain 5 temporary hit points for the duration. If a creature hits you with a melee attack while you have these hit points, the creature must make a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the temporary hit points increases by 5 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Catapult
entries: Choose one object weighing 1 to 5 pounds within range that isn't being worn or carried. The object flies in a straight line up to 90 feet in a direction you choose before falling to the ground, stopping early if it impacts against a solid surface. If the object would strike a creature, that creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the object strikes the target and stops moving. When the object strikes something, the object and what it strikes each take {@damage 3d8} bludgeoning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the maximum weight of objects that you can target with this spell increases by 5 pounds, and the damage increases by {@dice 1d8}, for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cause Fear
entries: You awaken the sense of mortality in one creature you can see within range. A construct or an undead is immune to this effect. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you until the spell ends. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

spell.name: Ceremony

m.text: 25 gp worth of powdered silver, which the spell consumes

entries: You perform a special religious ceremony that is infused with magic. When you cast the spell, choose one of the following rites, the target of which must be within 10 feet of you throughout the casting.

entries.name: Atonement
entries: You touch one willing creature whose alignment has changed, and you make a DC 20 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check. On a successful check, you restore the target to its original alignment.

entries.name: Birth
entries: When cast on a humanoid mother while she is giving birth, she will not die as a result of childbirth and the child has advantage on saving throws against disease until it turns 1 year old.

entries.name: Bless Water
entries: You touch one vial of water and cause it to become holy water.

entries.name: Chosen of the Faith
entries: You touch one humanoid that has been dedicated to your god's service for at least one year. A symbol of your god is inscribed somewhere on the target's body, most commonly upon a hand or on the forehead. This symbol is {@condition invisible} to other creatures, with the exception of other humanoids that bear the same symbol. A creature with {@sense truesight} can also see the symbol.
The symbol lasts until it is dispelled.

entries.name: Coming of Age
entries: You touch one humanoid who is a young adult. For the next 24 hours, whenever the target makes an ability check, it can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check. A creature can benefit from this rite only once.

entries.name: Dedication
entries: You touch one humanoid who wishes to be dedicated to your god's service. For the next 24 hours, whenever the target makes a saving throw, it can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the save. A creature can benefit from this rite only once.

entries.name: Fertility Rite
entries: When cast on two willing creatures, the next time they attempt to conceive an offspring together within the next 24 hours, and are capable of doing so, they succeed.

entries.name: Funeral Rite
entries: You touch one corpse, and for the next 7 days, the target can't become undead by any means short of a wish spell.

entries.name: Wedding
entries: You touch adult humanoids willing to be bonded together in marriage. For the next 7 days, each target gains a +2 bonus to AC while they are within 30 feet of each other. A creature can benefit from this rite again only if widowed.

spell.name: Chameleon
entries: You change your skin, clothes, armor, and anything else you're wearing to match your background. For the duration, as long as you are not moving, you are effectively {@condition invisible}. A creature can use its action to make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) or Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check vs your spell save DC. On success, it sees you until its line of sight to you is broken.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 hour for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Chaos Bolt
entries: You hurl an undulating, warbling mass of chaotic energy at one creature in range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8 + 1d6} damage. Choose one of the d8s. The number rolled on that die determines the attacks damage type, as shown below.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, each target takes {@damage 1d6} extra damage of the type rolled for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Charm Person
entries: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

It must make a Wisdom saving throw, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, it is {@condition charmed} by you until the spell ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it. The {@condition charmed} creature regards you as a friend and your companions as friendly acquaintances. When the spell ends, the creature knows it was {@condition charmed} by you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

spell.name: Chromatic Orb
entries: You hurl a 4-inch-diameter sphere of energy at a creature that you can see within range. You choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the creature takes {@damage 3d8} damage of the type you chose.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Color Spray

components.m: a pinch of powder or sand that is colored red, yellow, and blue

entries: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand. Roll {@dice 6d12}; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can effect. Creatures in a 15-foot cone originating from you are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring {@condition unconscious} creatures and creatures that can't see).

Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell is {@condition blinded} and {@condition incapacitated} until the end of your next turn. Subtract each creature's hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature's hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, roll an additional {@dice 3d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Command
entries: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesn't understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it.

Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so, the DM determines how the target behaves. If the target can't follow your command, the spell ends.

entries.name: Approach
entries: The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

entries.name: Drop
entries: The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

entries.name: Flee
entries: The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

entries.name: Grovel
entries: The target falls {@condition prone} and then ends its turn.

entries.name: Halt
entries: The target doesn't move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft, it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

spell.name: Compelled Duel
entries: You attempt to compel a creature into a duel. One creature that you can see within range must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is drawn to you, compelled by your divine demand. For the duration, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than you, and must make a Wisdom saving throw each time it attempts to move to a space that is more than 30 feet away from you; if it succeeds on this saving throw, this spell doesn't restrict the target's movement for that turn.

The spell ends if you attack any other creature, if you cast a spell that targets a hostile creature other than the target, if a creature friendly to you damages the target or casts a harmful spell on it, or if you end your turn more than 30 feet away from the target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Comprehend Languages

components.m: a pinch of soot and salt

entries: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear. You also understand any written language that you see, but you must be touching the surface on which the words are written. It takes about 1 minute to read one page of text.
This spell doesn't decode secret messages in a text or a glyph, such as an arcane sigil, that isn't part of a written language.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 hour for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Continual Flame

m.text: ruby dust worth 10 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch (20 ft. bright, 20 ft. dim), springs forth from an object that you touch. The effect looks like a regular flame, but can be of any color, and it creates no heat and doesn't use oxygen. A continual flame can be covered or hidden but not smothered or quenched.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the bright and dim light both increase by 10 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Corruption
entries: Your inflict a withering curse upon a 5-foot square of ground at a location you can see within range, withering plants and darkening the earth with fell power. At the start of each of your turns for the duration, the corruptive curse grows 5 feet in every direction. Whenever a creature starts its turn in a space afflicted by the curse, it must make a Charisma saving throw. If it fails, it takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Create or Destroy Water

components.m: a drop of water if creating water or a few grains of sand if destroying it

entries: You either create or destroy water.

entries.name: Create Water
entries: You create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range in an open container. Alternatively, the water falls as rain in a 30-foot cube within range, extinguishing exposed flames in the area.

entries.name: Destroy Water
entries: You destroy up to 10 gallons of water in an open container within range. Alternatively, you destroy fog in a 30-foot cube within range.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you create or destroy 10 additional gallons of water, or the cube increases by 5 feet, for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cruorwhip
entries: You create a whip out of your own blood in your free hand. By expending a number of hit points, you create a whip similar in size and shape to a normal whip. If you let go of the whip, it disappears, but you can recreate it again as a bonus action.

You can use your action to make a melee spell attack with the whip. For every 5 hit points spent in the casting of this spell the reach increases by 5 feet, with a minimum health cost of 5 hit points. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cryota's Crafty Cover
entries: You conjure an object (you decide on how it looks) which covers an area which is 5 feet wide and 5 feet tall, and is planted into the ground. This object can act as half cover for
Medium or smaller creatures.

The object must be conjured on a horizontal surface. If the object were to be conjured on a space where a creature or object already exists, the spell fails and the action is lost but the spell slot is not wasted.

If one want to move the cover they must make an Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check against your spell save DC, moving it 5 feet per number they beat the DC by. If it can't be moved due to being blocked by a creature, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the range increases by 10 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cure Wounds
entries: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Dark Pounce
entries: The first time before the end of your next turn you make a running jump, you instead teleport to your landing location. If this jump would take you into a Large or smaller creature's space you appear in an unoccupied space in front of the creature (if there is none, the spell fails). The target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target falls {@condition prone} and if you have a free hand, is {@condition grappled} by you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a 3rd level slot or higher, you can cast it with a bonus action.

spell.name: Death Coil

components.m: A piece of bone carved into the shape of a skull

entries: You launch a ball of negative energy at a single target within range. Depending on your target, it has two different effects:

entries.name: Living
entries: Make a spell attack roll. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage.

entries.name: Undead
entries: You restore hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting modifier to the creature.
This spell has no effect on constructs.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd Level or higher, the damage and hit points restored increases by {@dice 1d6} per spell level.

spell.name: Death's Grasp
entries: Grasping spectral hands sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square. For the duration, these hands turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain. Creatures starting their turn in the area or entering the area for the first time on their turn must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage from the spectral hands.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Defiant Smite
entries: When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can cause wrathful energy to rush through your weapon. The attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage to the target.

Additionally, if the target is a creature, its ability to attack is hindered. Until the spell ends, the creature must make a Charisma saving throw at the start of each of its turns. If it fails, the first time it hits with an attack before the end of its turn, it is knocked {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Defy Ruin
entries: You point to an object that you can see, filling it with preservative magic. The object gains resistance to all damage, and cannot be damaged by any effect that would inflict less than 5 damage. You can touch the object as a bonus action to remove this magical effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 8 hours for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Detect Evil and Good
entries: For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located. Similarly, you know if there is a place or object within 30 feet of you that has been magically consecrated or desecrated.
The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 fool of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Detect Life
entries: For the duration, you know if there is a beast, humanoid, or plant within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Detect Magic
entries: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any.
The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Detect Poison and Disease
entries: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you. You also identify the kind of poison, poisonous creature, or disease in each case.
The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Disguise Self
entries: You make yourself - including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person - look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between. You can't change your body type, so you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs.
Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing or would feel your head and hair. If you use this spell to appear thinner than you are, the hand of someone who reaches out to touch you would bump into you while it was seemingly still in midair.
To discern that you are disguised, a creature can use its action to inspect your appearance and must succeed on an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check against your spell save DC.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 hour for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Dissonant Whispers
entries: You whisper a discordant melody that only one creature of your choice within range can hear, wracking it with terrible pain. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage and must immediately use its reaction, if available, to move as far as its speed allows away from you.

The creature doesn't move into obviously dangerous ground, such as a fire or a pit. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't have to move away. A {@condition deafened} creature automatically succeeds on the save.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Distort Mass

components.m: a lead sphere at least 1 inch in diameter

entries: You touch one nonmagical object no larger than a 5-foot cube, altering its weight for the duration. When you cast the spell, choose one of the following effects:

entries.name: Mass Decrease
entries: The weight of the object halves.

entries.name: Mass Increase
entries: The weight of the object doubles.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the size of the cube you can affect increases by 5 foot for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Divine Favor
entries: Your prayer empowers you with divine radiance. Until the spell ends, your weapon attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d4} radiant damage on a hit.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for every two slot levels above the 1st.

spell.name: Drunkard's Breath
entries: You let out a tremendous, foul-smelling belch in a 15-foot cone. Creatures in the area must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute, and spends its action on its next turn retching and reeling. Creatures that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw.
An affected creature repeats its saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the size of the cone increases by 5 feet for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Duskwalk
entries: Choose a location within range that is within 5 feet of a creature or in dim light or darkness. You teleport to this location. As a bonus action before or after teleporting, you can make a single melee spell attack against a target within your reach. If you hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} psychic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the range increases by 5 feet and the psychic damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above

spell.name: Earth Tremor
entries: You cause a tremor in the ground in a 10-foot radius. Each creature other than you in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. If the ground in that area is loose earth or stone, it becomes difficult terrain until cleared, with each 5-foot-diameter portion requiring at least 1 minute to clear by hand.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Enchanting Gaze
entries: Your eyes shine with arcane glimmer as you focus your gaze at a creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of your next turn, and on its turn, it must use all of its movement to move closer to you, ending its turn if its moves within 5 feet of you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell's range increases by 10 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ensnaring Strike
entries: When casting this spell, you take the {@action Attack} action. Whether you hit or miss, choose a creature you attacked, a writhing mass of thorny vines appears around the target, and it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the magical vines until the spell ends. A Large or larger creature has advantage on this saving throw. If the target succeeds on the save, the vines shrivel away.

While {@condition restrained} by this spell, the target takes {@damage 1d6} piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature {@condition restrained} by the vines or one that can touch the creature can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC.
On a success, the target is freed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Entangle
entries: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20- foot square starting from a point within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain.

A creature in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the entangling plants until the spell ends. A creature {@condition restrained} by the plants can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself.
When the spell ends, the conjured plants wilt away.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, each side of the square increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Expeditious Retreat
entries: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace. When you cast this spell, and then as a bonus action on each of your turns until the spell ends, you can take the {@action Dash} action. On the turn you cast this spell, your movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 10 minutes for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Explosion
entries: You create a small but powerful explosion centered on a point within range. All creatures within 5 feet of that point take {@damage 1d4 + 1} force damage, and must make a Strength saving throw or be thrown 5 feet from the blast and knocked {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, increase the damage by {@dice 1d4 + 1} and push effect by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Eye of the Watcher

m.text: a humanoid eye preserved in rare oils worth at least 10 gp

entries: You touch the eye used as this spell's material component, and imbue it with magical power. As long as you are within 150 feet of the eye, you can use your action to see out of it, becoming {@condition blinded} to your own senses.
The eye can be manipulated as normal - it can be thrown, rolled across the floor, or subjected to similar effects without damaging it or ending the spell. If the eye is destroyed, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell lasts for an additional hour, and the 150 feet range increases by 50 feet for each spell level above 1st.

spell.name: Faerie Fire
entries: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 10-foot radius.
Any attack roll against an affected creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the cube increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Fall
entries: You alter gravity for yourself, causing you to reorient which way is down for you until the end of your turn. You can pick any direction to fall as if under the effect of gravity, falling up to 500 feet before the spell ends. If you collide with something during this time, you take falling damage as normal, but you can control your fall as you could under normal conditions by holding onto objects or move along a surface according to your new orientation as normal until your turn ends and gravity returns to normal.

spell.name: Falling Spider's Spite

time.condition: made when an enemy falls prone within your reach

entries: You instantly leap at a creature that has fallen {@condition prone} and make a single melee weapon attack. If you hit, the target's movement speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn and they must make a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can move 10 feet before making the attack for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: False Life

components.m: a small amount of alcohol or distilled spirits

entries: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain {@dice 1d4 + 4} temporary hit points for the duration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you gain 5 additional temporary hit points for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Feather Fall

time.condition: which you take when you or a creature within 60 feet of you falls

components.m: a small feather or piece of down

entries: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target five additional creatures for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Find Familiar

m.text: 10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier

entries: You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: bat, cat, crab, fish, hawk, lizard, owl, poisonous snake, rat, raven, sea horse, spider, squid, toad, or weasel. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form, though it is a celestial, fey, or fiend (your choice) instead of a beast.

Your familiar acts independently of you, but it always obeys your commands. In combat, it acts on your turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal. When the familiar drops to 0 hit points, it disappears, leaving behind no physical form. It reappears after you cast this spell again.

While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as an action, you can see through your familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses that the familiar has. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

As an action, you can temporarily dismiss your familiar. It disappears into a pocket dimension where it awaits your summons. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As an action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in any unoccupied space within 30 feet of you.

You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you already have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new form. Choose one of the forms from the above list. Your familiar transforms into the chosen creature.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the spell as if it had cast the spell. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must use its reaction to deliver the spell when you cast it. If the spell requires an attack roll, you use your attack modifier for the roll.

spell.name: Finder's Mark
entries: You throw the bones into the air while touching one creature or object. For the duration of the spell, you gain advantage on all Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks you perform to locate the chosen creature or object.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration of the spell increases by 8 hours for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Fog Cloud
entries: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. When casting the spell you can choose to concentrate on it, if you do, it is not dispersed by wind for the duration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the fog increases by 20 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Gaea's Hand
entries: You conjure a makeshift arm made of weeds and branches that sprouts out of a point you can see within range. It lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the hand. On a hit, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier and its speed is reduced by half until the end of its next turn.
As an action, you can make the hand disappear and appear at another place within range.
As a bonus action on your turn, you may command the arm to strike a foe within 5 feet of it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increase by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ghastlight
entries: You touch the item used in casting the spell and alight it with a sickly green flame that gives off no heat, shedding bright

entries.name: Toad
entries: Tiny beast, unaligned

entries.name: Hit Points 1 (1d4-1)
entries: Speed 20 ft., swim 20 ft.
STR DEX CON INT WIS CHA

entries.name: Skills Perception + 1, Stealth +3
entries: Senses {@sense darkvision} 30ft., passive {@skill Perception} 11

entries.name: Languages -
entries: Challenge 0 (10 XP)

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: The toad can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Standing Leap
entries: The toad's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

entries.name: Weasel
entries: Tiny beast, unaligned

entries.name: Hit Points 1 (1d4-1)
entries: Speed 30 ft.
STR DEX CON INT WIS CHA

entries.name: Skills Perception +3, Stealth +5
entries: Senses passive {@skill Perception} 13

entries.name: Languages -
entries: Challenge 0 (10 XP)

entries.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

entries.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage. light in a 15-foot radius, and dim light for an additional 15 feet. Undead creatures within its light that can see it gain a bonus to saving throws against being {@condition frightened} and effects that turn undead. The bonus is equal to your spellcasting ability modifier. A creature can only benefit from one such light at a time.
The flame cannot be extinguished by water or wind, but it can be covered and hidden, or overwhelmed by the darkness spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the bright and dim light increases by an additional 5 feet for each slot level above

spell.name: Gift of Alacrity
entries: You touch a willing creature, instilling it with a heightened reaction time. For the duration, while conscious, the target can roll and add an additional {@dice 1d8} to its initiative rolls.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Goodberry
entries: You create {@dice 2d4} + you Wisdom modifier berries in your hand.
A creature can use its bonus action to eat up to five berries.
Each berry restores 1 hit point.
The berries lose their potency if they have not been consumed within 24 hours of the casting of this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of berries summoned increase by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Grasp of the Specter
entries: The weapons in your hands glow with an ethereal light, which persist briefly even when they leave your hands. At the end of your turn, you can choose for any weapons you have thrown during the turn to teleport to your hands.

You can also chose for them to stay transfixed in their target. You can then use your action on a subsequent turn to wrench all weapons back, dealing {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage for each weapon. The weapons then appear within 5 feet of you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} per weapon for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Grease

components.m: a bit of pork rind or butter

entries: Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point within range and turns it into difficult terrain for the duration.
When the grease appears, each creature standing in its area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.
A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the dimensions of the square increases by 5 feet for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Guiding Bolt
entries: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target.

On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical dim light glittering on the target until then.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hail of Thorns
entries: As part of casting this spell you take the {@action Attack} action with a ranged or thrown weapon, as thorns start to sprout all over the ranged weapon or ammunition. Whether you hit or miss the first attack, the target and each creature within 5 feet of it must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 1d10} piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hallucination Spores
entries: You eject spores at a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for the duration. While {@condition poisoned} this way, the target is {@condition incapacitated} while it hallucinates. Creatures that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw.

At the end of each of its turns, and each time it takes damage, the target can make another Constitution saving throw, ending the spell on a success. The target has advantage on the saving throw if it's triggered by damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Healing Word
entries: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Heartseeker
entries: You touch a piece of ammunition or weapon with the thrown property imbuing it with the property of seeking its target.

When an ranged attack roll is made with that weapon, the attack roll can add your spellcasting modifier to the value on the dice. If that makes the value on the die a 20 or more, the attack is a critical hit. After making an attack with it, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 2nd level or higher, you can imbue an additional piece of ammunition or thrown weapon for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hellfire Lash
entries: You transform your whip into a flaming lash, striking out with scorching fury. When you cast this spell, you also take the {@action Attack} action. The first time you hit with this weapon, the target takes an additional {@damage 1d8} fire damage, and you can use a bonus action to hurl the target to a location of your choosing within 10 feet of their starting location. If they impact a surface or another creature, both take {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the fire damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hellish Rebuke

time.condition: which you take in response to being damaged by a creature within 60 feet of you that you can see

entries: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes {@damage 2d12} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Helping Hand
entries: You grant the severed hand of a creature sentience. For the duration of the spell, the crawling claw is under your command and can be commanded using your bonus action.

You can't have control over more than one claw at a time and it is under your control for eight hours, after which it stops obeying. To reassert control for another hour or to assert control over an existing crawling claw, you may cast this spell again.
If the hand's original owner is still alive, the claw will seek to reunite itself with its rightful owner when the spell ends. If its original owner is dead, the claw will wander off aimlessly.

Also, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, the hand can deliver the spell as if it had cast the spell. It must be within 100 feet of you, and it must use its reaction to deliver the spell when you cast it. If the spell requires an attack roll, you use your attack modifier for the roll.
Finally, it also counts as a corpse for the corpse lunge cantrip.

spell.name: Heroism
entries: A willing creature you touch is imbued with bravery. Until the spell ends, the creature is immune to being {@condition frightened} and gains 5 temporary hit points at the start of each of its turns.
When the spell ends, the target loses any remaining temporary hit points from this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the temporary hit points increases by 5 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hide Entrance
entries: You make a small incantation as you touch the area surrounding an opening or door, like the ground or a wall. A
5-foot square is hidden, as an illusion make it appear as the surrounding environment merges over it. This area appears to sight and touch as if it was a continuation of the surrounding material.
The illusion can be discovered with a successful Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check against your spell save DC.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target an additional 5-foot square for each slot level above 1st. Each square must have at least one face adjacent to the face of another square.

spell.name: Hunter's Pace
entries: You let out a hunting cry, empowering your body with speed and tirelessness. You gain advantage on {@skill Athletics} checks to Crawling Claw
Tiny undead, neutral evil

entries.name: Hit Points 2 (1d4)
entries: Speed 20 ft., climb 20 ft.
STR DEX CON INT WIS CHA
Damage Immunities poison
Condition Immunities {@condition charmed}, {@condition exhaustion}, {@condition poisoned}
Senses {@sense blindsight} 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive {@skill Perception} 10
Languages understands Common but can't speak
Challenge 0 (10 XP)

entries.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The claw is immune to effects that turn undead.

entries.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning or slashing damage (claw's choice) jump, climb, swim, or move. You also gain advantage on saving throws against {@condition exhaustion} and on checks to mitigate the effects of difficult terrain.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 2nd level or higher, your movement speed also increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ice Knife

components.m: a drop of water or a piece of ice

entries: You create a shard of ice and fling it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} cold damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the cold damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ichorous Smite
entries: When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you imbue the strike with a portion of your life force, expending a number of hit points as you cast the spell. The attack deals additional necrotic damage equal to {@dice 2d4} + the number of hit points spent.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Identify

m.text: a pearl worth at least 100 gp and an owl feather

entries: You choose one object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell. If it is a magic item or some other magicimbued object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires attunement to use, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn which spell created it.
If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn what spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional item for each slot level above 1st. Each item must be in contact with the first item you touch.

spell.name: Illusory Feint
entries: You conjure a fleeting illusion of an attack or movement. A creature within 5 feet of you must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failure you have advantage on melee attacks against the target until the end of your round.
A creature is unaffected by this spell if it can't see, if it relies on senses other than sight, such as {@sense blindsight}, or if it can perceive illusions as false, as with {@sense truesight}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell lasts for an additional round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Illusory Script

m.text: a lead-based ink worth at least 1 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You write on parchment, paper, or some other suitable writing material and imbue it with a potent illusion that lasts for the duration.

To you and any creatures you designate when you cast the spell, the writing appears normal, written in your hand, and conveys whatever meaning you intended when you wrote the text. To all others, the writing appears {@condition invisible}. Alternatively, you can cause the writing to appear to be an entirely message, written in a different hand and language, though the language must be one you know.
Should the spell be dispelled, the original script and the illusion both disappear.
A creature with {@sense truesight} can read the hidden message.

spell.name: Induce Headache
entries: Targeting a creature with 6 or more Intelligence, you inflict an instantaneous headache upon them. While you concentrate on the spell, the target takes 1 psychic damage at the start of each of their turns, and it has disadvantage on Intelligence checks and Constitution saving throws made to maintain {@status concentration}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Inflict Pain
entries: You attempt to touch a creature, inflicting them with negative energy and racking them with excruciating pain. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage and become {@condition incapacitated} with pain until the start of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Inflict Wounds
entries: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach.
On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Jump
entries: Choose 3 creatures that you can see within range. Each creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Klazomania
entries: You point at a creature within range and suggest a short phrase of up to 5 words, forcing the target to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is forced to use their reaction to shout the nearest approximation to the proffered phrase that exists in their native tongue.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

spell.name: Longstrider
entries: You touch a creature and increases its speed by 10 feet until the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mage Armor
entries: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. Each creature must touch at least another targeted creature.

spell.name: Magic Missile
entries: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range.
Each dart deals {@damage 1d4 + 1} force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Magnify Gravity
entries: The gravity in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on you increases for a moment. Each creature in the sphere on the turn when you cast the spell must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage, and its speed is halved until the end of its next turn.
On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no reduction to its speed.
Until the start of your next turn, any object that isn't being worn or carried in the sphere requires a successful Strength check against your spell save DC to pick up or move.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Masterful Focus
entries: You whisper a word and weave magic over your own mind, heightening your senses and reflexes. Until the spell ends, your attacks can result in critical hits more easily. Whenever the result of the {@dice d20} roll is 17-20, you critically hit. If you've made an attack with disadvantage and one of the results was in this range, you can ignore the disadvantage and critically hit regardless. Once you've critically hit once, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 2nd level or higher, you can critically hit one additional time before the spell ends for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mock the Living
entries: You make one undead—including its clothing, armor, weapons, and equipment—look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it.
